snippet: Abreham Zemedagegehu, who finds solace in his faith,  communicates with the help of an iPad, which was bought with Neediest Cases funds.
abstract: Community Services Society provides Abreham Zemedagegehu, whose homelessness is complicated by the fact that he is nearly deaf, with an iPad and accessories that will help him communicate with government agencies that can help him with opportunities for housing and employment.
lead_paragraph: Abreham Zemedagegehu, who finds solace in his faith,  communicates with the help of an iPad, which was bought with Neediest Cases funds.

headline.seo: Technology Makes Life a Little Easier for Homeless and Deaf Ethiopian Immigrant
headline.main: For a Homeless Deaf Man, an iPad Makes Life Easier
headline.print_headline: For a Homeless Deaf Man, An iPad Makes Life Easier

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
